text: Gary Merrill (2 August 1915 - 5 March 1990) was an American movie and television character actor. His credits included more than fifty feature movies, a half dozen mostly short-lived TV series, and dozens of televisions guest star appereances. Merrill starred in All about Eve and married his co- star, Bette Davis. ==Other websites== * * * *New York Times biography Category:1915 births Category:1990 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Hartford, Connecticut
title: Gary Merrill
